name: Abandoned Project
description: This is a old project of mine, I created it a long time ago and keept the files. I figured it would be better to have it here and hopefully never lose it. Its currently a reminder of what happens when you dream to big. The idea was to make a game about a dwarf that got kicked out of his home and now romed the country side living in a tent. The current system generates a endless world with rabbits, fish and foxes. The foxes were never given ai.
